files.description: Deterministic generator that creates runtime/outputs/plan_project_scope_and_outline.md and ensures it maps exactly to runtime/outputs/REPORT_OUTLINE.md and the section skeleton in runtime/outputs/DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md.
Defines the canonical outline data model, deterministic section ID generation, and rendering functions used to produce all three markdown outputs consistently.
Markdown rendering helpers that format headings, tables, checklists, and anchored section skeletons in a stable, deterministic way.
File I/O utilities for atomic writes, directory creation, newline normalization, and deterministic content hashing to verify mapping.
Command-line entrypoint that runs the generator with fixed defaults, validates deterministic mappings, and writes all required output files.
Keeps the runtime/outputs directory present in version control for generated plan and report artifacts.
Usage documentation describing how to run the script to generate plan_project_scope_and_outline.md, REPORT_OUTLINE.md, and DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md with deterministic mapping guarantees.

missionDescription: Create runtime/outputs/plan_project_scope_and_outline.md and ensure it deterministically maps to runtime/outputs/REPORT_OUTLINE.md and the section skeleton inside runtime/outputs/DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Defines report scope, audience, and required sections in a concrete planning artifact, reducing ambiguity and enabling rapid instantiation of DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md and downstream case-study integration....
